title: Explainable Artificial Intelligence (XAI): Concepts, Taxonomies, Opportunities and Challenges toward Responsible AI

tldr.text: Previous efforts to define explainability in Machine Learning are summarized, establishing a novel definition that covers prior conceptual propositions with a major focus on the audience for which explainability is sought, and a taxonomy of recent contributions related to the explainability of different Machine Learning models are proposed.
